meta_title: Augmentation Meaning: Definition for Industrial Maintenance
meta_description: Augmentation is the strategic enhancement of human capacity through technology and expertise. Understand its role in scaling maintenance and closing skill gaps.
title: What Is Augmentation?

image_prompt: A professional maintenance engineer in a modern 2026 manufacturing facility wearing high-tech PPE and an augmented reality headset. The engineer is inspecting a large industrial pump, with holographic data overlays showing temperature and vibration levels. The background is a clean, well-lit industrial floor with diverse team members collaborating. Photo-realistic, cinematic lighting, no text.
